message: Hi Bob, I propose we settle this right away: I take $35, you get $65. Delaying only diminishes our money—with my value dropping 10% each round and yours 5%, it makes sense to agree now. I believe this offer is fair given our respective patience. What do you say?
I appreciate your offer, Alice, but I'm going to need a bit more than that. I'm willing to compromise and take 60%, leaving you with 40%. Let's get this done quickly and avoid further losses.

Bob, your offer of $40 for me and $60 for you in round 2 seems a reasonable way to avoid further devaluation of our funds. I'm willing to accept this proposal as it’s in both our interests to close the deal now.
